title: Suspicious Grinning Eye
info: The Suspicious Grinning Eye is a Master Mode-exclusive drop from the Eye of Cthulhu, with a 25*1/4 (25%) chance to drop. It summons a Suspicious Eye pet, which resembles the Eye of Cthulhu. It normally shows a blue iris and pupil, but when moving rapidly (such as when dashing or jumping) the pupil slides up and reveals a mouth, similar to the Eye's second form.
stat:
Type
Pet summon
Use time20 (Very fast)
TooltipSummons a suspicious eye
'Seems to have lost its look.'
